dmca.title: D.M.C.A issue: www.videoprofessorforfree.com and www.video-professor-video.com
dmca.body:
From: Michael Angiolillo [mailto:mangioli@videoprofessor.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 11, 2005 11:59 AM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: D.M.C.A issue: www.videoprofessorforfree.com and
www.video-professor-video.com


 
 
 
 
 

March 11, 2005
SENT VIA EMAIL: legal@theplanet.com
 
Mr. Lance Crosby, Esq.
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons #110
Dallas, TX. 75207
 
Re: www.videoprofessorforfree.com <http://www.videoprofessorforfree.com/> 
      www.video-professor-video.com
 
Dear Mr. Crosby, 
 
            This Notification of Claimed Infringement is sent to you as The
Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. Agent Designated to Receive Notice of
Claimed Infringement pursuant to the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act,
17 U.S. Code Section 512. Video Professor, Inc. is the owner of valuable
copyrights and trademarks which are being infringed by the websites,
<http://www.videoprofessorforfree.com/> www.videoprofessorforfree.com and
www.video-professor-video.com which we understand is hosted by The
Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.  Specifically, the owners of the
<http://www.videoprofessorforfree.com/> www.videoprofessorforfree.com and
www.video-professor-video.com website have copied Video Professor's
copyrighted and trademarked materials posted on Video Professor's website at
www.videoprofessor.com and copied them to their sites at
<http://www.videoprofessorforfree.com/> www.videoprofessorforfree.com and
www.video-professor-video.com We have a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by Video Professor,
Inc., any agents or the law.
 
The information in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I
am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner, Video Professor, Inc.
Thank you in advance for expeditiously disabling access to the website as
required by the DMCA.
 
Sincerely,
 
Michael Angiolillo
Paralegal
Video Professor, Inc.
12055 W. 2nd Place
Lakewood, CO 80228
V: 303-232-1244 x 146
F: 303-202-9929
E: mangioli@videoprofessor.com
